content.detailedDescription: Large bright light east to west 10:32 white rock b.C. an owl or some other animal making noises not a hoot more of an oooo odd noise ... felt strong desire to go outside. a slight change of direction and a change from a bright white to red before it vanished. going east or? a jump in the old time space continuum. i think it was large breasted hotties from space saying hi. elohim and the yahweh mobile?  if it was the big headed bug people i really just want them to go back to their own mud hole.
content.summary: Very bright light and big like a dime... thought it was space station but movement was not smooth as in orbit. watched for 10 seconds what seemed to be a flash then changed colour from a bright light to red, then it just disappeared. heard owls loud

content.detailedDescription:
Was on back deck of home facing looking west. thought i was seeing a very large, red meteor falling rapidly from upper atmosphere on slight angle to sw skies over hwy 101. went from tiny to huge w/i 6 seconds. it appeared to be "crashing" over hwy 101. by the time it was directly over the tree line it was distinctly a very large (no relative measurement), very bright red, round orb; pulsing with rhythm.  it appeared like a solid red glowing 'marble'.  as i said, i thought it was crashing because of the speed it was 'falling'. no evidence of a crash though.

i have reported blinks and stuff before so was reluctant to report, fearing ill be seen as a nut.
my primary emotion was extreme  excitement and excruciating frustration  because i didn't know what it was and it didn't reappear. it disappeared behind the trees separating me from hwy 101 & i waited but it not reappear, nor did i glimpse it thru the trees which i would anticipate had it been a craft landing at the mason co airport.

i found it hard to return inside the house. when i returned in, the cable tv was tiling. it is continuing to experience interference but subsiding.

like many i imagine, i have to say my husband is a pilot, i grew up around mcchord fort lewis military base and seatac airport. i've also seen meteors (some dramatic) and many satellites. there is also an airport north of shelton so had to think about that. the pulsing i saw was unlike any navigational lights i am used to seeing on flying crafts.

this was bigger and brighter than anything i have ever seen in the sky. the round orb shape was very round and entirely bright, bright red. pulsing very brightly. 

(it is now 9:30 pm and the cable tv is no longer tiling).

i immediately called my husband who was not here, hoping perhaps he was on hwy 101 returning home and perhaps saw it too. he didn't. 

i am reporting in case someone else saw it and reported it too. i understand the importance of triangulation.
content.summary: Rapidly descending bright red pulsing orb,

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside middle of night after learning my friends brother was killed on his motorcycle. i went out to pray and to smoke. i was upset. i looked up and saw this in the sky. came in got the camera and my husband to look at it. we both watched it and i took a video of it. i uploaded it to youtube. it's clear as day on the video. we are in the city and we don't see things like this here. it was red and yellow and centrifugal type movement with what seems like a red x shape center and yellow light emitting. i have never seen anything like this before. i wanted to see if you could investigate? i sent it to the news stations but not sure if they will even bother. i know what we saw. it was planet sized and it was moving.  

on the video i uploaded it's clear it is between two stars and the stars or satellites are stationary and the object is moving, glowing, emitting light. i am not sure what it was but it's not earth made that is sure. i put video on youtube will send it to you if you email me.
content.summary: Red, x shape? with yellow light, centrifugal force, emits light, moves fast!

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of march 30th i went outside to relax in the hot tub. the sky was clear and i was looking at the stars and what appeared to be jupiter in the east and when i turned to look to the south there was a bright round light in the sky, roughly 22 to 30 degrees above the horizon. i noticed it because it wasn't there a few minutes before. at first i didn't think there was anything unusual as there is a fair amount of air traffic around here, but as i watched it seemed to be not moving. the light was bright white, like an airplane landing light and as i watched it got larger and brighter and gave the appearance of coming directly towards me. it became very bright and was perfectly round. then it seemed to turn away, to the east and quickly faded to orange and disappeared completely. after returning to the house i thought that was the oddest aircraft light and movement and i've seen plenty of aircraft at night. i decided to write this account because a few days later the local newspaper reported many sightings of strange lights in the sky along the border areas of michigan and ontario.
content.summary: An unusual bright light in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke a ciggerette with my friend on my back porch and looked up. there was the craft which suddenly appeared out of no where. it took me about 30 seconds to start recording. it started off with blue/white light and moving slowly then it would ok like it was coming closer and/or acending. then the craft would stop and hover then changed to a red orangish color. would move left then right then stop and ascend a bit. then it changed to copper/gold light and redded further away from side to side then it would stop. then we watched it dissappear over the buildingings. i have had multiple sitings i have t reported on this sight because i just found out about it but have records os and pictures of other ufos and orbsof light. i am a reiki healer and see energy and work with thigher vibrationa/frequency beings. i have also had two attacks of lower dimentional beings when i was younger. ri was excited and shocked because it was my birthday! quite a birthday present! after the video was taken we noticed an orb of light manifested itself almost during the duration of the video. i would love to be contacted and share my other experiences.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appeared out of nowhere. color chamging lights stopping and starting, changing direction acending and decending.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke a ciggerette with my friend on my back porch and looked up. there was the craft which suddenly appeared out of no where. it took me about 30 seconds to start recording. it started off with blue/white light and moving slowly then it would ok like it was coming closer and/or acending. then the craft would stop and hover then changed to a red orangish color. would move left then right then stop and ascend a bit. then it changed to copper/gold light and redded further away from side to side then it would stop. then we watched it dissappear over the buildingings. i have had multiple sitings i have t reported on this sight because i just found out about it but have records os and pictures of other ufos and orbsof light. i am a reiki healer and see energy and work with thigher vibrationa/frequency beings. i have also had two attacks of lower dimentional beings when i was younger. ri was excited and shocked because it was my birthday! quite a birthday present!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appeared out of nowhere. color chamging lights stopping and starting, changing direction acending and decending.

content.detailedDescription: Hi. my name is "l" and i'm in kapuskasing ontario. do i have a sighting for you! i didn't see it but my mother her husband their neighbour and his friend saw it a few months ago and since it's affected her and hasn't had good sleep since i thought it my opportunity to contact mufon with her consent.  all witnesses are available for comment. the object was in a lightbulb shape and had a glow to it which could not make it possible to know wether it was solid or not. if you are interested in knowing about it you have my number and contact with the people is possible.
content.summary: A lightbulb shaped orb.

content.detailedDescription: Two large red orbs moving slow across the night sky.
content.summary: Two large orbs

content.detailedDescription: Event 2 of 3 by karen donaldson, apr1979 - witness (a) and her 12 year old daughter were driving east along m88 toward central lake, mi at about 2pm.   to the north on the driver���s side of the vehicle, witness (a) observed a reflective, cigar shaped, silver object like a jet without wings just above a barn at about a 25 degree inclination angle.  she stopped the car and observed the object traveling to the west at a very slow pace.  the observation lasted for about 5 minutes when the object suddenly disappeared.  it was a clear sunny afternoon.
content.summary: E2 of 3: apr1979, silver, cigar shaped airplane like object without wings, traveling slowly to the west.

content.detailedDescription:
While checking the guards in the nuke storage area at raf bentwaters, england
either i noticed or it was brought to my attention of a bright star like object traveling across the sky at a constant slow speed. my initial thought was that it was a satellite but decided to check with the control tower to determine if there were any flights scheduled in the area. i was informed that no flights were scheduled nor was any satellites scheduled to be seen in this area. the tower also informed me they showed nothing on their radar.
so many years have passed that i don't recall who else was with me during this episode.
content.summary: Bright star like object

content.detailedDescription: Daughter and i were taking a break from raking the yard and were sitting on the concrete stairs outside our door facing backyard. 2. my daughter noticed object first. i looked up, saw a plane traveling one way and daughter pointed out the other object which was in a different location than the plane itself. 3. when i noticed what she was pointing at, it looked like an "egg" with a straight line of travel, not bobbing or swaying. 4. the object moved in a straight line at a slow pace, was hard to focus on because of the bright day. it was an egg shaped object, white in color (not sure if it was glowing or if reflecting, but it was definitely white. it seemed to slow a little before slightly curving its course and staying straight after doing so, ascending upward and then not visible anymore.  5. we were both curious. 6. lost sight of it from it moving upward until no longer could be seen. (note: it was not rising like a balloon would. it appeared to be ascending while traveling across the sky, slowly, with no swaying, no bobbing. the object appeared to be controlled)
content.summary: A white "egg" (oval) shape moved over two back yards

content.detailedDescription: I have never had a ufo experience before or any paranormal or supernatural  experiences but am quite intrigued by all the subjects and am fairly knowledgable compared to your average joe. i'll also add that my father is a retired lt.Col. in the usaf and i grew up on/next to airforce bases my whole life and am familiar with alot of the aircraft that we fly. anyway my experience isn't as dramatic as many out there and i don'thave any pictures/video to go with it or even other witnesses to back it up! lol. i myself am quite skeptical of much of what is out there and it's hard to believe one persons word. that being said, i'm a huge supporter of "the cause"- to get the government to divulge everything we the people have a right to know and believe that everyone should do their part to advance this agenda especially those who are fortunate enough to have an experience they believe to be extraterrestrial related. this experience happened to me about 5 yeaars ago in what i believe was january, i have a terrible time remembering when things happened as the years go on. i know it was around christmas/new years (a little after i believe) and was either 2008 or 2009. i worked at the fox run mall in newington nh . i ran the housekeeping department for the whole mall and at this mall we had two large outdoor signs, one at each of the main entrances as you drive in. the signs were roughly 20 feet tall and you  can put whatever combination of the letters on them you want, hece any message. lucky for me the job of changing the messages fell on me and it was done once a week, preferably saturday night so sunday would run the new message. well it was about 1 am in the morning and thiswas my last job befor heading home. the mall closed at 9 with the doors lcking at 10 however it takes awhile to scrub the floors, clean the bathrooms,, etc. then see the other employees finish and start my signs. to put the letters on the sign you used a very long pole with a suction cup on the end that you would use to get the previous letters down then use the suction cup to pick up your new letter and put it up on the board where it would sit in these rims that lined the board. in order to do this you stand at the bottom and you have to lterally look straight up which is why i stated it took place at 90degrees from the horizon. so i had been out there for a half hour or so and was in the process of applying the new letters and looking straight up at the sign but also with the entire sky in my field of vision as well. it was then that i saw three lights enter my view that appeared to be fixed to each other in triangular formation as they did not variate in their positions on the triangle  at all. the apparent "craft"  was moving at a great velocity, much greater than say a fighter jet  and traveled in an amazing zig-zag across the entire sky in the scope of maybe 2 seconds. it was unbelievable, the way the "craft" would go from one point then change direction in a 45 degree angle to another point then change  direction then  finally one more point where it again changed the direction in the blink of an eye and then out of sight.   it made absolutely no sound and since it was so early in the morning(approx.1:30aam) the silence was even more apparent. had a plane or jet or helicopter been at that distance you woulkd have heard it quite well. the whole experience ,although it happened quickly , was so unnatural and unlike anything i thought was even possible it literally scared me and i was 30 years old, not a little kid. i ran to my car where i monitered the sky for at least 15 -20 minutes , half expecting it to come back , before i returned to finish the job. i was quite shaken for the rest of the evening and finished fairly quickly after that. it was the single most amazing and uybelievable thing i have ever seen. if we have technology that can do that then we truly are centuries ahead of what we think we are capable of and i felt when i saw it  that there was no way that it was of this earth and man-made. i know it' s just another civilian sighting without a whole lot to back it up but i believe every piece gets us a little closer to knowing the truth and you guys are at the front lines of this fight and i admire you for it. go mufon!
content.summary: 3 fixed lights traveling at high rate of speed at high altitude zig-zag across the sky

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work just before 5 a.M. on us 1, aiken/augusta highway, there were no other cars around when i saw a cop-light blue very large comet-like object flash across the sky in the lefthand corner of my windshield. my eye followed it as it moved left, and just as i looked directly at it, it flashed into a bright ball (same blue color) and entirely disappeared. i would have thought it was a comet, but it was very large, and when it disappeared, not even the tail/trail was visible any longer. i was actually a bit frightened when i saw it, but now i wish someone else had seen it, or that it was on camera somehow. 
i got home a few minutes later and stood in the driveway looking at the sky until the moon set but saw nothing unusual.
content.summary: Blue comet-like object flashes into ball and disappears.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside walked to edge of carport the craft was so low it grabbed my eye my first insinct was a huge bird thought i was lunch but quickly realized it was square/rectangele shape the sky had an overcast and seem to blend in with sky the top had shades of light gray bottom more dark like black no more than 25 30 feet in air i could have thrown baseball and hit it it moved at a 5 to 10mph like it was on a string i was frozen to move i could not understand what i saw so i just odserved and wrote it down directly after cause memories are usally not as clear each time there remembered once it moved out west bound almost out of visibillity i ran to neoghbors back yard and craft was to well blended in i could no longer visually c it i know fire is hot women drive u crazy and this was a flying craft maybe 6 to 8 feet long and 2 to 5ft in height and 4 to 6 feet across?????????????????????????????????   u tell me and we both know,but we really know just ..................................................
content.summary: Mini van size blend in with sky dark btm lght gray top 10ft above house 3ft hight

content.detailedDescription: I was a guest in a villa in mazandaran north of iran on shore of caspian sea.I tried to call my husband in canada with my cell phone but i didnt have receptor i went to the terrace to see if is working outside ,the sky was clear and i saw this object which was glowing ,i called my host familly to come outside and see it.The whole family ,4 sons their wives and their daghter and my host and his wife and their 5 grand children came out to the terrace.Their daughter who was at that time in last year of university told me this is a big ufo and even she had taken its picture with her smart phone we all stayed outside and talk about ufos. people in iran have a normal reaction to this subject and beleive human being is not alone as we were talking the object vanished and again reappeared but in opposite side of where it was.It was like a sun disc who was impulsing flare of lights .They told me when this object is around cell phones are not working!Properly meanwhile,i saw an airplane was going from south to north,crossing caspian sea toward russia but the ceilling of its fly was way higher than this object.I saw this object qne more time,it was 3:oo in the morning .It was stationed in ne and i could see it from my bedroom window ,i scared and closed the window.But i couldnt sleep last time i checked on it was gone it was 5:00 am
content.summary: Sun disc size at 10:30 pm

content.detailedDescription: Was going home from work and spotted a ufo near u.S. 422. object was triangular shaped and flying low, made an abrupt 90-degree turn. blue and red lights, some pulsating, some fixed. spotted around 9:50 pm on april 12, 2014. another driver spotted it and exited his vehicle to observe it. heard report from another that they spotted the same object about 10 miles west shortly before i had observed it. no other unusual occurrences.
content.summary: Spotted triangle shape object coming home from work

content.detailedDescription:
Went out the back garden to smoke and noticed a bright light up on the sky (not too high) 
my first thought was shooting star but when i got a good lol at it knew it was moving to slow g
for a shooting star and too bright the light dimmed to where i almost couldn't see it but slowed down to an almost stop. the light then dimmed right down (like a shooting star but when it brightened back up it had moved forward 100 ft without me seeing it this light continued on for about 600ft when i noticed a second light further forward and on are south eastern direction on a slightly different trajectory but similar direction. the first light by this time was almost almost completely faded but the second was very bright. i had my mobile phone in my pocket i pulled it out set it to video and pointed up but my flash was on as i attempted to a
switch off flash i was looking at them and the lights both diminished but i could still see the outer shape of the second one for a second then that disappears. it was a clear night at that time and i could see planes in the distance 10 x and could clearly see flashing lights on these planes the two white objects i saw had no flashing lights, at the tome i was in awe but also scared as i felt they knew what i was doing (attempting to get a shot ) i remember holding on tight to the door and was unsettled by the experience.
content.summary: I went out to the back garden to smoke as soon  as i'm light up out the corner of my eye i see a really bright light after 10 secs saw second light

content.detailedDescription: Night time around 11 pm blue light caught my eye i was on porch looking up it lasted about a second ! shape like a egg so fast. faster then jet or plane no sound to low to ground to be aircraft . it was like a very fast blue egg .  it was if i had to guess about a mile of ground   looked it up and found a picture on line of it to a "t" !Def . a ufo in my mind right away but you never know what is already identified and what isn't.. left me feeling happy to see such a beautiful  thing so out of the ordinary  but also a lil scary , cause i never saw that before .  it disappeared as fast as it appeared right in front of my eyes . there are not just buried treasures in this world , sometimes you hafta look up ! the photo i'm going to try to post is not one that i took but a perfect replica of what i saw . i saw this on line and was so amazed someone else saw this as well !
content.summary: Very fast very low to ground blue tail blue shap like a egg

content.detailedDescription: This night was different.  my cousin and i were out having a smoke break from playing a video game. it was a crystal clear night. no clouds in the sky. we were on the deck, off the back of his house. the sky was impressive that night.  in this rural area,  it seems you can see endless amounts of stars. i was telling him to look up and check the sky out. we were checking out orion, taurus,  and there was a little cresent moon nearby.  i had turned around and was looking inside the sliding glass door, into his house. all of a sudden, my cousin is like almost screaming at me to look at this.  he kept saying it, "look at this!". i have pointed out things before that were satellites in the sky, slow moving. we had seen shooting stars back there, before.  i wasn't expecting to turn around and see what i saw. i turned around and he was pointing to something in the sky.  i looked in the direction he was pointing at and saw a big, flying v in the sky heading south to north in a straight line.  it was sort of dim at first but then it banked, and the v got brighter.  it looked like the moon was reflecting off the surface that had caused it to get brighter. we both were like " what is that".We heard no sound.  i thought we were going to see it for awhile but it just vanished, mid sky. i went to college to be an aircraft mechanic at embry riddle aeronautical university and i know what i saw wasn't a technology that has been released to the public yet, if it isn't alien. we went back inside, and we're pretty shook up about it. we had both seen it bank to the left, so the wings were more visible at one point during the sighting.  it's one thing to see an object by yourself and you feel like everyone will think your crazy if u report it. but we both saw it. it's now been a couple of weeks since that night, but it's still the first and last thing we talk about.  we've tried to debunk it ourselves but keep coming back to, it just wasn't from here. it was soo still that night, there was no sound. it was too big, flying too low not to blow the roofs off houses with sound. the no sound thing really is what gets to me.
content.summary: I've never seen an object in the sky that gave me goosebumps until this night.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside walking home from the store at about 113am eastern time. i look at the skies a lot i'm very much fascinated by what's out in the universe and do believe in aliens. i saw an airplane first, the skies were clear and blue, and i live near an airport and was prior military so i know the different between a plane, helicopter and military vehicles. but as  was watching the plan, i notice a silver colored object just hovering at an altitude much higher than the plan, comparing  both in scale it was smaller than the plan which to me meant it was much higher. when i first saw it my first reaction was ufo, i've saw one one other time when i was in high school back in 1996, but that one was moving and i remember they were the same shape and color.

this object was not moving it was in the same spot i first observed it in, i continued watching it as i walked until it disappeared or vanished i should say.

no real reaction, with the billions of years the universe have existed i do believe other life forms are out there and more advance with capabilities to come and go to the planet as they please  without us even knowing.

i lost sight when it just vanished. i never took my eyes of until then.
content.summary: The skies were clear no clouds. i looked up, first noticing an airplane and then my eye shifted to this silver colored disc in the sky much smaller in scale to the airplane which was still in sight continued watching for about 4 min when it just vanished

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside on landline phone with a family member.  i first saw a unusual bright light ascending vertically.  then over 75 red lights ascended from this object.  i thought that what i was seeing were fireworks. until the lights started moving in formation westward.  i yelled for my son to bring his cell phone and who took a video. it was the most frightening and unexplained  thing i have ever seen.  my hands are still shaking and i still cannot explain what i saw. my son and husband also came out to see and cannot explain.  i thought we were being attacked. it was scary since there were so many of them.  no sound
content.summary: Standing outside house between 9-9:40 pm. starless evening. saw one object that looked unusual rise up from behind trees. firework like red lights appeared like fireworks ascended vertically then over 75 red lights ascended west.

content.detailedDescription: I took photos of a ufo when i was on my honeymoon in colorado. in august 2012 my wife and i went to ouray colorado to get married.My father had given us a new canon eos as a wedding gift. i was frantically taking pictures throughout the trip. most of the pictures were of mountains and geology because i am fascinated by it. we stopped at the alamosa k.O.A. after our first day of driving to rest for the evening. the next morning we mapped out the trip and decided to go north from alamosa, through salida, then onto gunnison and eventually end up in montrose before we headed south to ouray. after we departed the koa in alamosa, my wife was driving north on highway 17 i was the passenger and wanted to use the camera now that we had scenery. i was taking numerous types of photos trying to become familiar with the camera and all of the settings. i recall specifically taking the photos in question on a multi-pic mode- basically when depressing the shutter button it will take photos as fast as possible when the objects within the frame are in focus. the entire trip was awesome and i took approximately 500 photos.( the orignal photos were numbered 76,77,&78) after arriving back home, i had decided to hook the camera up to my hdtv video input so i could actually see the photos, the 3" screen was killing my eyes. i was deleting all of the out of focus or repeat pictures when my friend came over to see how the trip went. i was showing him some of the photos and that was when he said " what is that?" that was when i noticed the object. i was at a loss for words. i called my father, he said "whatever" i convinced him to come over and look at them, after arriving he was also at a loss for words, considering the object is in 3 frames consecutively and is at different elevations that are easily beyond any current technological capabilities. we quickly copied the photos to a secure sd card and i give him a copy. i did some research and found that was actually a ufo watchtower in center colorado, (approx 10-15 miles from where i took the photos)  i contacted them with my findings. the lady that runs the place called me and shared some very interesting information with me. a few days after speaking with her i received a phone cal from a gentleman who had spoke with the lady at the watchtower and decided to call me to confirm what i had seen. the guy was a mountain climber and had been stuck on mt. crestone( the peak in the photos) by weather when attempting to summit the mountain. after 2 days the weather cleared and he was able to summit the mountain. that was when he saw the "glowing purple ufo". it was not until i closely examined the photos that i noticed the object did actually have a purple glowing base to it.
content.summary: I took photos of this object and found them when i got home

content.detailedDescription:
on the morning of june 17, 2011, me and my brother-in-law were in front of my house in sugar land, texas working on his vintage 1970 vw beetle. both of us having seen ufos in the past, we always kept an eye to the sky. to the east we both happen to notice the classic vapor trial high up in the atmosphere that is usually associated with the alleged "aurora" black project; a straight-line vapor trail encircled by donut shaped "puffs". we could see the vapor trail being made, but we couldn't see the vehicle that was the source of the trail. the trail was being created very fast. in my opinion the vapor tail was being created 10x faster than any commercial jet contrail. as the trail moved from east to west we noticed a very unusual event. at about 45 degrees above the horizon it appeared as if a literal "window" opened in the upper atmosphere just before the vapor trail. this "window" opened from a pin-point to a box shape in less than a second, and then whatever was creating the vapor trail exited the "window" in the atmosphere and the vapor trail stopped. immediately after the vapor trail exited the window, the window closed in the same way it had opened. the window was open for about 3-4 seconds and while it was open you could see a clear patch of black sky, as though it was the middle of the night... and it was mid-day. after the "window" closed my brother-in-law and i looked at each other in amazement and said- "did you see that?" and then we both confirmed that we had both seen the same thing- what appeared to be a craft of some sort flying high in the atmosphere, opening a "window" in the earth's atmosphere, and then flying through it, with the "window" closing after whatever was making the vapor trail left the atmosphere. we came to the conclusion that it had to be some sort of government "black" project, and continued working on the old vw. of course we kept looking up the rest of the day... and it was a good thing we did.

  after sighting the strange vapor trail and "window" in the sky, i went inside and got my digital camera. within a few minutes of sighting the vapor trail and "window" in the sky we both saw an unusual triangle shaped object which appeared to be several thousand feet at almost 90 degrees above my house. i couldn't distinguish the object's color, but it appeared to be reflective of the sky... almost clear with the exception of what appeared to be white lights on one side of it. i snapped a few shots with my camera; a couple with trees in the foreground for perspective, and then a couple of shots zoomed in on the object. i looked at the screen on the back of my camera to make sure i had photographed the object and when i looked back up at the sky the object was gone. both me and my brother-in-law saw the object. we were both amazed at what we had winessed that day, but being open-minded, we were excited about what we had witnessed.

  the attached photos are of the triangle object we witnessed above my house. the pictured titled "unk.Jpg" is the first one taken with the tree in the foreground for perspective and the white dot in between the clouds is the object. the rest of the photos are zoomed-in shots.
content.summary: Witnessed dual sighting that day. one straight line leaving vapor trail, and one hovering then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard working on my back building on a ladder when i first spotted the orange pulsating bright light coming from the east flying directly over my house rather quickly in a straight path, with no noise, it started descending and then suddenly disappeared in the west still in the air.  i had yelled for my wife to come outside and told her to hurry and run.  it had disappeared by the time she got outside.  i started telling her about it when another orange pulsating bright light from the exact same location in the east was flying overhead, with the same fast speed, same path and suddenly disappeared in the same location in the west (exactly as it had done the first time).  this happened approximately within 2-3 minutes of each other. total time occurrence from the first siting to the second one disappearing was approximately 7 minutes. there was no other plane traffic in the area at the time.
content.summary: Orange light moving rather quickly in straight path then suddenly disappeared, then did the exact sequence once more from east to west

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my driveway at 8:40 pm and noticed what seemed to be a brighter and larger than normal star. i then looked north of that and notice a much larger odd shaped bright light, obviously not a star. i then took my camera phone and zoomed in on it. that is when i realized the shape was clearly triangle and not a star. there were stars in the area, but were not big or bright enough to show up on the picture. i then txted the picture to my ex-wife in burbank, ca. and she agreed and suggested i contact you. i attached the picture, i also called and left a message. if you have a problem getting the attached picture, feel free to call me. my name is david 818-355-5453
content.summary: Triangle or boomerang shape just hovering for long period of time

content.detailedDescription:
On june 16 2011 1:00 am i was having trouble sleeping, so i decided to go and have a cigarette on the back porch stoop. while sitting there in my bathrobe enjoying a clear star filled night, out of the west glided into my view a saucer shape craft, approximately 150 feet in diameter, traveling at approximately 5 to 10 mph at tree top level. it was so close; i felt as though i could have hit it with rock. at that point while directly in front of me, it wavered as though to impart some kind of communication, it felt almost like it was a case of waving  hands and at that point it changed direction and headed toward the northeast. as far as the craft description is concerned, it was black on top with a golden/creamy self luminous outpouring of light which had no effect on the surrounding area that i could discern. the top portion of the craft was the blackest of black that i have ever seen. i sat there stunned watching it simply glide behind the trees, then out of site disappearing all the while hoping for some kind of communication. i felt as though it was a tap tap tap on the shoulder, hi bob we���re here!

and ever since then i have become (awake and aware) and have been able to do self healing on more than one occasion���.. my intire paradigm has changed for the better finally...
content.summary: I saw a huge saucer shaped craft glide riight across in front of me.

content.detailedDescription:
My son, david k. ward had been telling he was seeing triangle ships hovering on top of our neighborhood since december of 2013 and i first witness a triangle shape, very large space ships as well which i dismissed as just a military ship.  however, last week i went to walk our dog with my son and saw about a dozen ships hovering around our neighborhood.  i filmed the space ships. in one of the films, a huge big round fire appears and then the space ships begin to leave. i was able to film some of them at a very close range were you can actually see the shape, lights and even the texture.  
i am sending two of the several films we were able to captured.
content.summary: My son and i filmed couple of spaceships with a bright very large fire circle were the ships disapeared

content.detailedDescription:
I had just been viewing moon, mars and jupiter using my telescope. i had put the telescope away and was looking east from the door of my house. i looked up and saw a fast moving patch of light. the basic shape of the light was a cross with the cross beam towards the rear of the object

   |
   |
   |
 -----
   |

the shape was not well defined and not very bright. the shape appeared to be broken into sections. there was no noise at all and the intensity stayed constant. the speed was greater than that of any of the planes we see in the area. i observed for a few seconds then went to get my binoculars which took about 3 seconds by then it had disappeared. either it had stopped giving off light or had gone below the hills in the distance.
content.summary: Faint cross shaped light heading rapidly east.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend & i were working on our boat restoration in the backyard. i always have my camcorder with me as there are strange sightings in the skies here in washington county. it was a bright sunny day today so it was difficult to see things on the view finder. i spotted a bright white object that looked like a disk or oval shape flying in the sky near an airplane i was watching. the white disk object was probably miles from the airplane but from my point of view it appeared to be above the airplane. i basically was using the airplane as a point of reference to keep an eye on this object. we watched it as it went out sight. i don't know what it was. i do know it wasn't any kind of airplane or helicopter.
content.summary: Daytime sighting of white disk object flying near airplane

content.detailedDescription: The evening of november 26, 2012, i was returning to st. george, ut, with 2 of my teenage daughters from las vegas, where we had taken a friend to the airport. it was in the evening, maybe 7:00 - 9:00 (this could be verified better by looking up flight times), but it was dark, we were traveling northbound on i-15, just south of mesquite, nv, a few miles.  the moon was bright, in the eastern sky, and visible to us most of the trip.  when we got to this point (maybe 7-10 miles south of mesquite) we noticed a large orange orb-like light low on the assumed horizon directly to our west in the barren desert. at first glance it looked like the moon partially peeking up over a mountain. it had no apparent movement. i initially thought that it was just the moon, until we all realized that the moon was to our east, and completely visible. we observed the light for maybe 5 - 10 seconds, and then it just disappeared, turned off, was gone.  i immediately asked my daughters if they had seen what i just saw, and they both had been watching as well and we were all very shook up by the sighting.
content.summary: Large glowing moonlike orb appeared just above horizon for several seconds
